title: Optimize Ad Fill Rate
description: The ad operations team notices that the ad fill rate for a specific content category is low, meaning revenue is being lost.

tasks.description: Retrieve the ad performance report for the last 7 days, filtered by content category.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a report showing the 'Documentary' category has a low fill rate.

tasks.description: Analyze the ad campaigns targeted at that category to see why they are not filling.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the floor price for ads in the documentary category is set too high.

tasks.description: Lower the floor price for the documentary category to be more competitive and attract more bids.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the floor price in the ad management system.
